title: How to Install Adobe Acrobat Reader

steps.title: Download the Software by clicking on the Download Button.
steps.content: Download the Software by clicking on the Download Button.

steps.title: Go to the directory, where your downloaded Installation file has been kept, usually Desktop.
steps.content: Go to the directory, where your downloaded Installation file has been kept, usually Desktop.

steps.title: Let the Setup File install Adobe Acrobat Reader on your computer.
steps.content: Let the Setup File install Adobe Acrobat Reader on your computer.
